title: Winnie the Pooh Up,Up and Away
brief_description: In “The Piglet Who Would Be King” , Piglet surprises his friends and becomes king of the piggies. “There’s No Camp Like Home” when a crazy, though good-natured family of Heffalumps and Woozles develop a fondness for Pooh’s honey. In “Nothing But Sweet Tooth” some mischievous pack rats snatch Pooh Bear’s sweet tooth. Rated: G
